- `vm_name` (string) - The name of the instance to provision.

- `virtual_image_id` (int64) - The id of the ISO virtual image to use as the instance instance source image.

- `plan_id` (int64) - The ID of the service plan that will be associated with the instance.

- `cloud_id` (int64) - The ID of the cloud that contains the MVM cluster.

- `storage_volume` ([]StorageVolume) - Storage Volumes
